title: Procesadora La Hacienda, Inc. Recalls Meat Products Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, March 1, 2017 Procesadora La Hacienda, Inc., a Juncos, Puerto Rico establishment, is recalling approximately 140 pounds of raw meat products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains wheat...

impacted_products: 10-lb box containing 2 pieces of 5-lb “Seasoned Meat” chubs.
